channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flat B, 52 Priory Road, London, NW6 3RE, 23rd June
item.description:
The streetlights outside her door & on her road are not working so she is having to walk down the street at night in the pitch-black dark which could be dangerous for her due to her age. She doesn’t have access to email so please call her if you need too.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Priory Road, South Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public bin emptied and bags left next, 23rd June
item.description:
The refuse workers are leaving bin bags from the local public bins next to our house. These bags contain cat litter and faeces and attract flies into our house. This time they have been left there all weekend. Please can they be left elsewhere in future.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clevedon Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roadworks on Oakfield Rd and Woodbine Grove inadequate pedestrian provision, 23rd June
item.description:
These roadworks on the footpath are at the corner of a very busy road. There are no pedestrian alternatives provided, just "footpath closed" signs at either end. These are not obvious when approaching from woodbine grove so by the time you see the sign, you're forced to cross the road at its busiest point or walk in the road around the obstruction. There is a nursery right next to the works and many people taking babies and children to school along this road. There needs to be a pedestrian footpath alternative to be safe. These works started today (23/06/25).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakfield Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Athenlay Road overrun with weeds, 23rd June
item.description:
In contrast to all other streets in the area, Athenlay road has been left to get overrun. The pavements are uneven, and the area looks in decline. This has an effect on the way locals treat it. We’ve seen increased dog litter and discarded rubbish.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Athenlay Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly-Tipping, 23rd June
item.description:
Our general waste bin (black bin) was unfortunately missed during today’s collection. All other bins on the street have been emptied, so I believe ours may have been missed by mistake. Given the current hot weather and the fact that the next scheduled collection is two weeks from now, I kindly request that an urgent collection be arranged as soon as possible to prevent any hygiene issues. Please find attached recent photos of the bin for your reference. I’d also like to note that all our waste is properly sorted and recycled, so this may have simply been an oversight. Thank you for your support, and I look forward to your response.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lambscroft Avenue, Chinbrook, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household Rubbish Dumped on Wheathill Rd corner Croydon Rd, 23rd June
item.description:
Two wheelie bins filled to the brim and household rubbish dumped on pavement (Wheathill Rd corner Croydon Rd). Public safety issue -- flies and maggots feasting on rubbish and people have to walk on road to avoid. PLEASE FIX IMMEDIATELY!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wheathill Road, Anerley, London
